title: 你们有开过服务器的经历吗？
txt_content: 本人开过一个，但是由于管理不佳，关服了

replies.author: 暴漫问
replies.txt_content: 怎么开服？

replies.author: GOD丶SAMA
replies.txt_content: 我挺想开的，但是开不了，不会啊QAQ{:10_512:}

replies.author: sky建筑大师
replies.txt_content: 有一堆好基友233

replies.author: asjkdaskljda
replies.txt_content: 服主路过，哈哈哈哈～的确很难{:10_512:}

replies.author: 我叫aaaa9
replies.txt_content: 服务器完美运行路过

replies.author: Buryer
replies.txt_content: 现在正开着呢

replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content: 没有开过，但我看我同学开过

replies.author: nomo00
replies.txt_content:
有参与过开服
楼主贴吧来的吧？
同腐竹，路过

replies.author: 回忆♂比利
replies.txt_content: 正在开服的腐竹路过qwq

replies.author: 天狗
replies.txt_content:
没开过服
压根不会开
但是去过朋友的服务器
只不过后来因各种开服软件问题关了

replies.author: Mr_Liuxing
replies.txt_content: 开过，还算好啦。

replies.author: [HM]-knead
replies.txt_content: 同正在开着

replies.author: m2.5
replies.txt_content: 想开，可是开不了【满脸无赖】

replies.author: 2kat
replies.txt_content: 开过，还好，不是很难，就是花时间

replies.author: nuo13260
replies.txt_content: 捡够钱关服跑路的路过

replies.author: 雾晨丶破晓
replies.txt_content: 有，但没时间....关服了

replies.author: 麦白
replies.txt_content:
管理不佳关服了
是不是玩家没钱给赞助 你关了

replies.author: V5法克鱿
replies.txt_content: 我没有，原因：没钱

replies.author: 屎莱姆.
replies.txt_content:
开过几次
但都因为某些原因关了

replies.author: 屎莱姆.
replies.txt_content:
以上故事告诉大家
做好万全准备再开服
